item.title: Save and use old Mac fonts with fondu
item.description: I recently received a help desk request to install a font that one of our schools had purchased back in the 90s. Not a problem, I thought. Copying the font to the machine would be easy. I went and mounted the disk image that contained the font, but when I …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: T3 June 6,2013 - Quitting, the box, and a font
item.description:
In Pursuit of Happiness

First up is an impassioned teacher's resignation video. Her speech won't be a revelation for teachers. I'm posting it for those out there who feel the same way, You're not alone.

One fascinating aspect of watching this on Youtube is the number of I quit videos …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
